actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to permit widows and surviving divorced wives who remarry after age 50 to qualify for medicare.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to provide coverage under title XVIII (Medicare) of such Act to widows and surviving divorced wives who remarry after age 50. (Current law requires such individuals to be 60).

titles.title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to permit widows and surviving divorced wives who remarry after age 50 to qualify for medicare.
